snippet: The aircraft carrier John C. Stennis supported ground troops in Afghanistan as scheduled after being warned not to re-enter the Persian Gulf.
abstract: United States aircraft carrier John C Stennis, despite threats from Iran's government that it should not re-enter the Persian Gulf, experiences no usual activity while in international waters and continues to support ground troops in Afghanistan as scheduled.
lead_paragraph: The aircraft carrier John C. Stennis supported ground troops in Afghanistan as scheduled after being warned not to re-enter the Persian Gulf.

headline.seo: Work as Usual for U.S.S. John C. Stennis After Warning by Iran
headline.main: Work as Usual for U.S. Warship After Warning by Iran
headline.print_headline: Work as Usual for U.S. Warship After Warning by Iran
